abilities_bot.name: Bloodcurdling Screech
abilities_bot.desc:
⬻ (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>auditory<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>emotion<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>fear<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>);  The primal owlbear unleashes a loud screech that terrifies its prey. Each creature in an 80-foot emanation must attempt a DC 28 Will save. Regardless of the result, creatures are temporarily immune for 1 minute.
__Critical Success__ The creature is unaffected.
__Success__ The creature is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Frightened|frightened 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.
__Failure__ The creature is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Frightened|frightened 2<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.
__Critical Failure__ The creature is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Fleeing|fleeing<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for 1 round and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Frightened|frightened 3<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

abilities_bot.name: Gnaw
abilities_bot.desc:
⬻ __Requirements__ The primal owlbear has a creature <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Grabbed|grabbed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> with its talons.  __Effect__  The owlbear attempts to disembowel the creature with a beak <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Strike<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>. If the <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Strike<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> hits, the target must attempt a DC 30 Will save.
__Critical Success__ The target is unaffected.
__Success__ The target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Sickened|sickened 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.
__Failure__ The target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Sickened|sickened 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Slowed|slowed 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> as long as it remains <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Sickened|sickened<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

abilities_bot.name: Screeching Advance
abilities_bot.desc: ⬺ (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>auditory<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>emotion<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>fear<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>);  The primal owlbear makes a Bloodcurdling Screech and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Stride|Strides<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> twice. All creatures within 80 feet of the owlbear at any point during this movement are subjected to the effects of Bloodcurdling Screech.

abilities_bot.name: Mind Harrier
abilities_bot.desc:
`pf2:2` (Enchantment, Mental, Psychic, Incapacitation); **Requirements**: Targets one creature within 60 feet and visible to the Foulspawn Mockery. The Mockery distorts reality for a moment, implanting a psychic seed in the mind of its foe. Those separated from allies find the seed blooms into agonizing pain. The target must attempt a Will save.
- **Critical Success**: The target is unaffected.
- **Success**: The target takes 2d6+6 mental damage.
- **Failure**: The target takes 2d6+6 mental damage and is cursed. Until the end of its next turn, if it ends its turn not adjacent to any ally, it takes 10 mental damage and becomes clumsy 1 for 1 round.
- **Critical Failure**: As failure, and the target also gains persistent mental damage (1d10). The persistent damage ends automatically when the target ends its turn adjacent to an ally or succeeds at a DC 25 Will save at the end of its turn.

abilities_bot.name: Maddening Burst
abilities_bot.desc:
`pf2:3` (Enchantment, Mental, Psychic, Emotion); **Frequency**: Recharge 5–6 on 1d6 With a sudden pulse of mind-warping thought, the Mockery floods the minds of nearby foes with hallucinations and chaotic voices that disrupt clarity and decision-making. All enemies within 10 feet of the target location must attempt a Will save.
- **Critical Success**: The creature is unaffected.
- **Success**: The creature takes half damage.
- **Failure**: The creature takes 2d6+6 mental damage and is stupefied 2 for 1 round.
- **Critical Failure**: The creature takes full damage, is stupefied 2 for 1 minute, and must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to cast spells or activate abilities with a verbal component while affected.

abilities_mid.name: Double Actions
abilities_mid.desc: Morrn rolls initiative twice and takes a full turn on each result. He can take two reactions per round, but only one between each of his turns.

abilities_mid.name: Insubstantial
abilities_mid.desc: Morrn takes half damage from all sources except force and positive damage. If he takes radiant damage, this trait is suppressed until the start of his next turn.

abilities_bot.name: Gladiator’s Instinct
abilities_bot.desc: __Trigger__: An enemy enters a square flanking Morrn. __Effect__: Morrn makes a melee Strike against the flanking creature. On a hit, the target is pushed 15 feet.

abilities_bot.name: Rejuvenation
abilities_bot.desc: If destroyed, Morrn reforms in 1d10 days unless his remains are sanctified with a __6th-level__ or higher __consecrate__ spell.

abilities_mid.name: Rune Effect
abilities_mid.desc: Whenever Olek uses an attack power, he chooses one of its two rune effects (conquest or resistance). He gains that effect for that use of that power.

abilities_mid.name: Stand the Ground
abilities_mid.desc: Olek is moved 5 feet less by any forced movement effects.

abilities_mid.name: Steady-Footed
abilities_mid.desc: When Olek would be knocked <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>prone<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, he can attempt a DC 30 Reflex save to remain standing.

abilities_mid.name: Runic Font
abilities_mid.desc: If a Runic Font is active in the encounter, Olek gains one additional action per round.

abilities_mid.name: Rune of Command's Curse
abilities_mid.desc: After Olek uses **Rune of Command's Blessing**, if he rolls a natural 5 or lower on his first attack roll during a turn, he becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>controlled<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> by an external entity until the end of his next turn.

abilities_bot.name: Rune of Command’s Blessing `pf2:2` (arcane, auditory, emotion, mental)
abilities_bot.desc:
**Frequency**: Once per encounter, usable only while below 50% HP. Olek targets all enemies in a 10-foot emanation. DC 34 Will save.
**Success**: Unaffected.
**Failure**: Target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>controlled<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> until the end of Olek's next turn.

**Conquest Rune**: Olek gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls until the end of his next turn.
**Resistance Rune**: Each enemy that succeeds their save becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>enfeebled 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> until the end of Olek’s next turn.

abilities_bot.name: Runic Duality `pf2:r` (reaction, arcane, divine)
abilities_bot.desc: **Trigger**: A creature within Olek’s melee reach uses a manipulate, move, or attack action. **Effect**: Olek makes a Runic Warhammer Strike with one of his rune effects.

attacks.desc: Runic Seal +30 (30 feet, radiant), Damage (1d10+13) 1d10+13 radiant + target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>immobilized<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (DC 34 Fortitude negates, ends at end of target’s next turn). **Conquest Rune**: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes 2d6 radiant damage. **Resistance Rune**: One ally adjacent to the target gains 20 temporary Hit Points.

abilities_top.name: Equipment
abilities_top.desc: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>weapon-potency|+2<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>striking|Greater Striking<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>warhammer|Warhammer<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>; <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>armor-potency|+2<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>resilient|Greater Resilient<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>half-plate|Half Plate<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>; <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>elemental-wayfinder-lopsg|Elemental Wayfinder (Earth)<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> ;

abilities_mid.name: Rune Effect
abilities_mid.desc: Whenever Olek uses an attack power, he chooses one of its two rune effects (conquest or resistance). He gains that effect for that use of that power.

abilities_mid.name: Stand the Ground
abilities_mid.desc: Olek is moved 5 feet less by any forced movement effects.

abilities_mid.name: Steady-Footed
abilities_mid.desc: When Olek would be knocked <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>prone<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, he can attempt a DC 30 Reflex save to remain standing.

abilities_mid.name: Runic Font
abilities_mid.desc: If a Runic Font is active in the encounter, Olek gains one additional action per round.

abilities_mid.name: Rune of Command's Curse
abilities_mid.desc: After Olek uses **Rune of Command's Blessing**, if he rolls a natural 5 or lower on his first attack roll during a turn, he becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>controlled<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> by an external entity until the end of his next turn.

abilities_bot.name: Rune of Command’s Blessing `pf2:2` (arcane, auditory, emotion, mental)
abilities_bot.desc:
**Frequency**: Once per encounter, usable only while below 50% HP. Olek targets all enemies in a 10-foot emanation. DC 34 Will save.
**Success**: Unaffected.
**Failure**: Target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>controlled<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> until the end of Olek's next turn.

**Conquest Rune**: Olek gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls until the end of his next turn.
**Resistance Rune**: Each enemy that succeeds their save becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>enfeebled 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> until the end of Olek’s next turn.

abilities_bot.name: Runic Duality `pf2:r` (reaction, arcane, divine)
abilities_bot.desc: **Trigger**: A creature within Olek’s melee reach uses a manipulate, move, or attack action. **Effect**: Olek makes a Runic Warhammer Strike with one of his rune effects.

health.name: HP
health.desc: 270; _Immunities_ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>controlled<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (from Rune of Command's Curse source only), _Resistances_ 10 radiant, 10 mental

attacks.name: Melee
attacks.desc: Runic Warhammer +30 (magical, versatile B), Damage (3d8+13) 3d8+13 bludgeoning + **Conquest Rune**: Target must succeed a DC 34 Reflex save or fall <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>prone<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>. **Resistance Rune**: Olek or one ally adjacent to the target gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saves until the end of Olek’s next turn.

attacks.name: Ranged
attacks.desc: Runic Seal +30 (30 feet, radiant), Damage (1d10+13) 1d10+13 radiant + target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>immobilized<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (DC 34 Fortitude negates, ends at end of target’s next turn). **Conquest Rune**: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes 2d6 radiant damage. **Resistance Rune**: One ally adjacent to the target gains 20 temporary Hit Points.

abilities_mid.name: Crystal Refraction
abilities_mid.desc:
`pf2:0`  **Trigger** The crystal strider is targeted by a light effect
* * *

**Effect** The strider redirects the triggering effect to a different creature of its choice within 30 feet or absorbs the effect harmlessly, reducing the number of rounds left to recharge Release Light by 1.

attacks.name: Precise Steps
attacks.desc: The crystal strider's many narrow legs allow it to ignore difficult terrain.

attacks.name: Release Light
attacks.desc: `pf2:1` (attack,light,primal) The strider emits the light that continually refracts within them to cast <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Spells/Chromatic Ray|Chromatic Ray<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> as an innate primal spell heightened to 5th rank, with a +21 spell attack roll. The crystal strider can't Release Light again for 1d4 rounds.

attacks.name: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Bestiary Ability Glossary/Trample|Trample<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>
attacks.desc:
`pf2:3`  Large or smaller, leg, DC 29 Reflex check

* * *

abilities_mid.name: Purity Vulnerability
abilities_mid.desc: A hezrou revels in the foulness it exudes and becomes distraught when contaminations are purified. The first time in a round when a contamination is purified (such as via purify food and drink) or a toxin is neutralized (such as via neutralize poison) within 30 feet of a hezrou, the demon takes 6d6 (6d6) mental damage.

abilities_mid.name: Stench
abilities_mid.desc: (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>aura<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>olfactory<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>);  30 feet. A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 27 Fortitude save or become <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Sickened|sickened 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (plus <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Slowed|slowed 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for as long as itʼs <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Sickened|sickened<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> on a critical failure). While within the aura, affected creatures take a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Sickened|sickened<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

abilities_bot.name: Poisonous Pustules
abilities_bot.desc: ⬻ (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>poison<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>); __Requirements__ The hezrou is grappling a creature  __Effect__  Toxic fluids spurt from burst boils and weeping wens on the hezrou's body. A creature <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Grabbed|grabbed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> or <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Restrained|restrained<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> by the hezrou takes 2d12+6 (2d12+6) poison damage (DC 30 basic Fortitude save).

attacks.name: Melee
attacks.desc: ⬻ jaws (evil, magical, reach 10 feet) +24 __Damage__ 2d12+13 (2d12+13) piercing plus 1d6 (1d6) evil and Grab

attacks.name: Melee.
attacks.desc: ⬻ claw (agile, evil, magical, reach 10 feet) +24 __Damage__ 2d8+13 (2d8+13) slashing plus 1d6 (1d6) evil

spellcasting.name: Divine Innate Spells
spellcasting.desc: DC 27; __4th__ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>dimension-door|dimension door<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (at will), <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>divine-wrath|divine wrath<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (at will), <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>gaseous-form|gaseous form<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>; __5th__ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Abyssal-plague|Abyssal plague<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>dimension-door|dimension door<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>; __6th__ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>divine-wrath|divine wrath<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>paranoia<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>;

monsters.name: Mirror Man
monsters.languages: understands Common but speaks only in distorted echoes;

abilities_mid.name: Reflective Body
abilities_mid.desc: (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>aura<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>illusion<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>visiual<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>); **30 feet.** Light bends unnaturally around the Mirror Man. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura or enters it must succeed at a DC 32 Will save or be **Frightened 1** as distorted reflections of themselves stare back in twisted forms. A creature that critically fails is also **Stupefied 1** for 1 round.

abilities_mid.name: Reactive Reflection
abilities_mid.desc: `pf2:r` **Trigger:** The Mirror Man is targeted by a ranged Strike or spell attack. **Effect:** The Mirror Man warps light to defend itself, gaining **concealment** against the triggering attack. On a failed attack roll, the reflected energy lashes out, dealing `dice: 3d6` 3d6 mental damage to the attacker.

abilities_mid.name: Shard Form
abilities_mid.desc: When reduced to 0 HP or when critically hit, the Mirror Man shatters into razor-sharp fragments, dealing `dice: 3d6` 3d6 slashing damage to all creatures within 10 feet (DC 32 Reflex half). At the start of its next turn, it reforms at half its maximum HP. If struck by a **sonic** or **force** effect before that turn, the Mirror Man is destroyed instead of reforming.

abilities_mid.name: Light-Bound Nature
abilities_mid.desc: In total darkness, the Mirror Man is **slowed 1** and cannot use *Mirror Strike* or *Reflective Step*

abilities_bot.name: Mirror Strike
abilities_bot.desc: `pf2:2` The Mirror Man releases a refracted pulse of prismatic light in a **30-foot line**. Creatures in the area take `dice: 10d6` 10d6 mental damage (DC 32 Will save for half). A creature that fails this save by 10 or more becomes **Confused** until the end of its next turn, seeing reflections as allies.

abilities_bot.name: Reflective Step
abilities_bot.desc: `pf2:1` The Mirror Man teleports up to **15 feet** to any unoccupied space adjacent to a mirrored surface or bright light source it can see. The space it leaves becomes shimmering and difficult terrain until the start of its next turn as reflections briefly linger.

health.name: HP
health.desc: 175;  __Immunities__ bleed, death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, unconscious; __Weaknesses__ sonic 10 ; __Resistances__ physical 10 (except bludgeoning)

attacks.name: Melee
attacks.desc: ⬻ scything claw +26 (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>magical<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>); __Damage__ 2d8+12 slashing, and Yalax may <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>stride<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> the target 5 feet

abilities_mid.name: Enslave
abilities_mid.desc: ⬺ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>psychic<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>enchantment<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>incapacitation<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> — Ranged 60 feet; +24 vs. Will. On a hit, the target takes 3d6+14 psychic damage and takes a –2 status penalty to attack rolls against Yalax (DC 33 Will save ends). First failed save: target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>dazed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> and takes the penalty. Second failed save: target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>dominated<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (save ends).

abilities_mid.name: Psychic Shackles
abilities_mid.desc: ⬺ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>psychic<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>enchantment<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>area<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> — 20-foot burst within 60 feet; DC 33 basic Will save. On a failure, the target takes 5d8+15 psychic damage and is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>immobilized<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (save ends). On a success: half damage and the target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>slowed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (save ends). Usable once per hour.

abilities_mid.name: Mind Twist
abilities_mid.desc: ⬸ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>psychic<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>enchantment<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> — Once per round. Ranged 60 feet; Will DC 33. On a failure, the target must make a Strike against a target of Yalax's choice. It may choose to take 15 psychic damage instead of making the attack.

abilities_bot.name: Larva Burst
abilities_bot.desc: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>reaction<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>psychic<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> — Trigger: Yalax is first reduced to half HP. Effect: 10-foot emanation; DC 33 basic Reflex save. On a failure, the creature takes 4d10+18 damage and is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>slowed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (save ends). The area becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>difficult terrain<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> until the end of the encounter due to squirming grubs and larvae.

abilities_top.name: Crimson Insight
abilities_top.desc: The Crimson Seer automatically knows the location of any <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>slowed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>stupefied<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, or <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>dazed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> creature within 60 feet as if it had <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>tremorsense<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

abilities_mid.name: Grasping Tentacles
abilities_mid.desc: ⬺ (__occult__, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>attack<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>) __Frequency__ once per round. __Targets__ up to 2 creatures within 15 feet. __Effect__ Each must attempt a DC 37 Fortitude save. **Critical Success** Unaffected. **Success** <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>pushed|pushed 5 feet<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>. **Failure** <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>pushed|pushed 15 feet<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>slowed|slowed 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> until end of next turn. **Critical Failure** As failure, and if moved adjacent to the Seer, the Seer makes a Heavy Mace Strike.

abilities_mid.name: Mind-Bending Whispers
abilities_mid.desc: ⬺ (__occult__, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>auditory<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>) __Recharge__ 1d4 rounds. The Seer releases a psychic storm in a 10-foot emanation. Each enemy must attempt a DC 37 Will save. **Critical Success** Unaffected. **Success** Half of 8d10+10 mental. **Failure** Full damage and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>dazed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> 1 round. **Critical Failure** Full damage, 6d6 <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>persistent mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> damage, and dazed for 1 minute (DC 35 Will each round ends both).

abilities_mid.name: Compelling Whispers
abilities_mid.desc: ⬽ (__occult__, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>charm<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>auditory<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>) __Frequency__ once per round. __Targets__ Up to two <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>dazed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> creatures within 30 feet. __Effect__ Each must succeed at a DC 37 Will save or be <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>controlled<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for 1 round (as the *command* spell).

abilities_bot.name: Psychic Feedback
abilities_bot.desc: `pf2:r` Whenever the Crimson Seer takes damage from a mental effect, the source takes 6d6 mental damage (DC 37 basic Will save).

abilities_bot.name: Crimson Revelation
abilities_bot.desc: ⬺ (__concentrate__, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>divine<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>) __Frequency__ once per 10 minutes. __Effect__ For 3 rounds, creatures beginning their turn in the Mind Mire aura must attempt a DC 37 Will save or become <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>stupefied|stupefied 2<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for 1 round. The Seer gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and spell DCs.

attacks.name: Ranged • Occult Bolt
attacks.desc: ⬻ +29 (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>range increment|range increment 60 feet<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>magical<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>); __Damage__ 6d8+12 mental plus <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>slowed|slowed 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (DC 37 Will negates).

monsters.name: Eldritch Tyrant Mimic
monsters.languages: Common (can't speak), Deep Speech, telepathy 60 feet

abilities_top.name: Mimic Colossal Object
abilities_top.desc: The mimic can take the form of any Large unattended object (statues, altars, sarcophagi, arcane machines). Detecting its true nature requires a DC 38 Perception check.

abilities_top.name: Super-Adhesive
abilities_top.desc: A creature touching the mimic is automatically <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>grabbed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (escape DC 38). Weapons stuck to the mimic require a DC 38 Athletics check to pull free. Escape attempts using Acrobatics automatically fail.

abilities_mid.name: Ambush Devour
abilities_mid.desc: ⬺ __Requirements__ The mimic is disguised as an object. __Effect__ The mimic sheds its disguise, makes a pseudopod Strike, and pulls the creature adjacent to it. On a hit, the target is also grabbed. On a critical hit, the target becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>restrained<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

abilities_mid.name: Digestive Metamorphosis
abilities_mid.desc: Creatures <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>grabbed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> by the mimic take 3d6 acid damage and 3d6 mental damage at the start of the mimic’s turn (DC 38 basic Fortitude). On a critical failure, the target also takes a –1 status penalty to AC for 1 round as their body partially dissolves.

abilities_mid.name: Shifting Anatomy
abilities_mid.desc: The mimic gains resistance 15 to all physical damage except force or adamantine. It ignores difficult terrain and can Squeeze without penalties.

abilities_bot.name: Devouring Maw
abilities_bot.desc: ⬺ (__attack__) The mimic opens a fractal, shifting mouth in its surface and attempts to swallow a Large or smaller creature it has grabbed (DC 38 Fortitude). **Success** The creature is not swallowed. **Failure** The creature becomes swallowed, taking 4d6 acid + 4d6 mental damage each round. **Critical Failure** The creature takes double initial damage and is restrained inside the mimic.

abilities_bot.name: Morphic Disarm
abilities_bot.desc: ⬽ __Trigger__ A creature the mimic has grabbed attempts to cast a spell or use a manipulated action. __Effect__ The mimic reshapes around the creature, disrupting the action unless it succeeds at a DC 38 Reflex save.

health.name: HP
health.desc: 310; fast healing 15; __Immunities__ acid, precision, critical hits; __Resistances__ all physical 15 (except force or adamantine)

attacks.name: Melee • Engulfing Blow
attacks.desc: ⬺ +28; __Damage__ 4d8+14 bludgeoning plus 2d8 acid; the target must succeed at a DC 38 Reflex save or become <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>restrained<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

abilities_top.name: Mimic Object
abilities_top.desc: The mimic can take the shape of any Medium object. A creature must succeed at a DC 35 Perception check to determine the object is a mimic.

abilities_top.name: Adhesive
abilities_top.desc: A creature that hits the mimic with a melee weapon must succeed at a DC 34 Reflex save or the weapon becomes stuck. A creature that touches the mimic is automatically <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>grabbed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>. Removing an item stuck to the mimic requires a DC 34 Athletics check.

abilities_mid.name: Engulfing Ambush
abilities_mid.desc: ⬺ __Requirement__ The mimic is disguised as an object. __Effect__ The mimic sheds its disguise and makes a pseudopod Strike. On a hit, the target is also grabbed.

abilities_mid.name: Digestive Corrosion
abilities_mid.desc: A creature <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>grabbed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> or <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>restrained<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> by the mimic takes 3d6 acid damage at the start of the mimic’s turn (DC 35 basic Fortitude).

abilities_bot.name: Adaptive Adhesion
abilities_bot.desc: The mimic gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Grapple<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> any creature it already has grabbed.

abilities_bot.name: Shape Lock
abilities_bot.desc: A creature stuck to the mimic cannot Step, Stride, or Escape using Acrobatics.

health.name: HP
health.desc: 255; fast healing 10; __Immunities__ acid, critical hits, precision

attacks.name: Melee • Engulf Lash
attacks.desc: ⬺ +26; __Damage__ `dice: 3d8+13` bludgeoning plus `dice: 2d6` acid, and the target must succeed at a DC 35 Reflex save or become <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>restrained<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

The Seer releases a psychic storm in a 10-foot emanation. Each enemy must attempt a DC 37 Will save. **Critical Success** Unaffected. **Success** Half of 8d10+10 mental. **Failure** Full damage and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>dazed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> 1 round. **Critical Failure** Full damage, 6d6 <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>persistent mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> damage, and dazed for 1 minute (DC 35 Will each round ends both).

abilities_mid.name: Compelling Whispers
abilities_mid.desc: ⬽ (__occult__, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>charm<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>auditory<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>) __Frequency__ once per round. __Targets__ Up to two <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>dazed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> creatures within 30 feet. __Effect__ Each must succeed at a DC 37 Will save or be <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>controlled<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for 1 round (as the *command* spell).

abilities_bot.name: Psychic Feedback
abilities_bot.desc: `pf2:r` Whenever the Crimson Seer takes damage from a mental effect, the source takes 6d6 mental damage (DC 37 basic Will save).

abilities_bot.name: Crimson Revelation
abilities_bot.desc: ⬺ (__concentrate__, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>divine<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>) __Frequency__ once per 10 minutes. __Effect__ For 3 rounds, creatures beginning their turn in the Mind Mire aura must attempt a DC 37 Will save or become <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>stupefied|stupefied 2<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for 1 round. The Seer gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and spell DCs.

attacks.name: Ranged • Occult Bolt
attacks.desc: ⬻ +29 (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>range increment|range increment 60 feet<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>magical<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>); __Damage__ `dice: 6d8+12` mental plus <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>slowed|slowed 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (DC 37 Will negates).

skills.name: Acrobatics +32, Arcana +35, Occultism +31, Athletics +28, Deception +31, Diplomacy +29, Intimidation +32

abilities_mid.name: Meteoric Aura (aura, mental, emotion, occult)
abilities_mid.desc: 30 feet. Creatures entering or starting their turn take `dice: 2d6` mental damage and must succeed at a DC 34 _Will_ save or become _frightened 1_; critical failure is _frightened 2_. PCs who resisted Kataklysmos in Encounter 8 gain +1 to this save; those who accepted suffer –1.

abilities_mid.name: Reactive Chaos `pf2:r` (reaction, chaos, occult)
abilities_mid.desc: **Trigger** A creature critically hits Kassandra. Roll `dice: 1d4`: (1) Gravity Slip—20-foot area must succeed at DC 34 _Reflex_ or fall prone; (2) Psychic Lash—random creature takes `dice: 4d6` mental damage; (3) Warp Step—Kassandra teleports up to 30 feet; (4) Meteor Spark—10-foot burst for `dice: 3d6` fire, DC 34 _Reflex_ basic.

abilities_bot.name: Starlight Rupture `pf2:2` (fire, mental, occult, visual)
abilities_bot.desc: 30-foot cone; `dice: 10d6` fire + `dice: 10d6` mental damage, DC 36 _Will_ basic. PCs who accepted Kataklysmos roll twice and take the worse; PCs who resisted gain +1 on the save.

abilities_bot.name: Meteor-Heart Channel `pf2:3` (concentrate, metamagic, unique)
abilities_bot.desc: Once per encounter. Her next spell gains the _chaos_ trait and deals +`dice: 5d6` damage. She gains Resistance 10 to all damage until the start of her next turn. All creatures within 40 feet must succeed at DC 34 _Fortitude_ or become _slowed 1_ for 1 round.

health.name: HP
health.desc: 400; Fast Healing 20; At 200 HP, Kassandra’s body cracks with molten chaotic energy. She becomes Large and transitions to her **Phase 2** statblock.

attacks.name: Starlight Barrage (occult spell attack; see below) `pf2:2`
attacks.desc: +29 to hit, `dice: 6d10` force damage; empowered by meteor energy.

attacks.name: Chaotic Lunge `pf2:2`
attacks.desc: Kassandra Strides and makes two Chaos-Talon Strikes against different targets.

spellcasting.name: Occult Spontaneous Spells (DC 36, attack +29)
spellcasting.desc: _8th (4 slots)_—Starlight Rupture, *phantasmal calamity*, *warp mind*, reduced *meteor storm* (20-ft burst, 8d6 fire + 8d6 bludgeoning). _7th (4 slots)_—*chain lightning*, *disintegrate*, *divine wrath (chaos)*, *plane shift (outbound only)*. _6th (4 slots)_—*fireball (heightened)*, *dominate*, *slow*, *freezing rain*. _1st–5th_—*shield*, *mirror image*, *magic missile*, *dimension door*, *fear*. _Cantrips_—*daze*, *telekinetic projectile*, *detect magic*, *shield*.
